name: Melophilia
description:
Melophilia is a casual rhythm game where you play as a cassette player. Your owner is currently at school, but will soon be heading home. It has been a rough day, so your goal is to try to cheer her up by playing your best tunes. Can you make her happy before she gets home?

You hit the beat by pressing the space button. You can either listen to the music or watch when the beat hits the hit zone.  Try to hit it exactly when the beat is in the center of the hit zone! You can quit the game at any time by pressing the escape button.

Game project for course TPD4168 at NTNU (Autumn 2022)

Made by: Nicolai André Dalaaker, Jon Fredrik Eid and Celine Hogstad Nilsen
